name: Zennovia
description:
Zennovia is a company created and staffed by Information Technology professionals providing high quality IT solutions with value added. 
Our work ethics are based on three fundamental pillars: Trust, Respect and Quality in everything we do. 
We develop, test and implement 'custom-made' integrated solutions. We do not believe in the "one size fits all" approach used by other service providers. The main programming languages and technologies we use are: php, ajax, js, html, mysql, sql server, android, iOS.
